section.description: Alpha Anywhere will prompt for the value of which_state at run-time. Assuming the user selected "Florida", Alpha Anywhere would perform the query:

step.description: Specify values for the following fields:

case.title: Prompt
case.description: The text that appears on the dialog box that prompts for this parameter at run-time

case.title: Type
case.description: The type of the parameter (Character, Numeric, Date, or Logical)

case.title: Default Value
case.description: The default value for this parameter. When the dialog that prompts for parameters is displayed, the value that you specify here is shown as a default value. Note : You can specify an expression for the default value by starting the Default Value with an equal sign. For example, to specify today's date as the default value for a date field, specify: =date().

case.title: Choices
case.description: For radio buttons, list boxes, and combo boxes. Click the '...' button to display the define choices dialog box where you can enter a comma delimited list of choices available to the user.

step.description: Optionally. enter the New Dialog title.
Optionally, change the OK button text.
Optionally, change the cancel button text.
Click OK to continue or cancel to discard your inputs.

case.title: List Box
case.description: Displays a list of choices in a list. The choices are specified in the Choices field. Enter a comma delimited list, with no spaces between the commas. For example, Boston,New York,Atlanta.

case.title: Record List-List Box
case.description: Same as List Box, except that the choices are automatically derived from the values in a field in a table.

case.title: Combo Box
case.description: Displays a list of choices in a drop down list. The user is restricted to selecting from the list.

case.title: Edit-Combo Box
case.description: Same as Combo Box, except that the user is not restricted to selecting from the list. The user can type-in any value.

case.title: Record List-Combo Box
case.description: Same as Combo Box, except that the choices are automatically derived from the values in a field in a table.

case.title: Record List-Edit-Combo Box
case.description: Same as Edit-Combo Box, except that the choices are automatically derived from the values in a field in a table.
